name: PostMapper
author: Don Kukral

sections.description:
Allows you to manage realty listing via a custom post type

sections.installation:
Copy “postmapper” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.2

Verified compat with WP 3.9.1

1.1

Fixed hard coded DB prefix and verified compat with WP 3.9.1

1.0

Initial version
